content.title: Compassion
content.description: We work for justice in our neighbourhoods and around the world. Learn more about how we walk with vulnerable people, prioritize education before action, and invest in peacebuilding, poverty alleviation, and discipleship development.

content.text1: All people are created in the image of God and have infinite worth. Therefore we love, serve, and partner with vulnerable people as we journey toward relationship, justice, and peace.
What's the impact of a dollar? Give to Peacemakers to support MCC's peacebuilding efforts. Our goal this year is $100,000.

image1.alt: Girl wearing a head covering holding a hand drawn picture of her violent environment.

content.text1: When we partner organizations like MCC, we increase the impact made in addressing complex global issues. Collaborating with MCC can result in more cost effective and long-term solutions to complex global issues.

image1.alt: Girl wearing a head covering holding a hand drawn picture of her violent environment.

content.text1: One of our core values at The Meeting House is peace. It is because we value peace so much that we are supporting projects in Honduras in this season of our partnership with World Vision.

Poverty, violence, political instability, and natural disasters are part of the fabric of life in Honduras. And yet in the middle of these challenges are resilience and joy. In addition to child sponsorship, World Vision partners with churches and communities in Honduras to offer peace clubs, programs for kids and youth, and respond to emergencies.

As a church, we want to support these valuable programs and we invite you to join us. Consider making a special gift towards this beautiful, resilient country that is so filled with hope. Click below and indicate your donation is towards World Vision.

image1.alt: Woman looking at her phone and smiling.

content.text1: Poverty was never in God's design for humanity. Through our Compassion ministry we work toward justice and peace to address poverty in our world by developing disciples who model compassionate, Jesus-centred love.

image1.alt: An MCC volunteer is distributing to relief kits to refugee families in Jordan.

content.text1: This fund provides us with an opportunity to invest financially in local organizations we partner with across Southern Ontario who are having a positive impact in our community.
